title: Nila Nila Poguthae Lyrics Aravaan Songs Lyics
stanzas:
Singer: VIjay Prakash, Harini
Song: Nila Nila pogudhu

Music: Karthik
Movie: Aravaan

Nila Nila Nila Nila, Nila Nila Nila Nila
Nila Nila Nila Nila

[Nila Nila Poguthae, nillaamal Poguthae
oolaa oolaa pogudhu, oorvalamaa Poguthae
kaadu mala medu ellaam maranji maranji Poguthae...[ (2)

Inba nila pogudhey, idam marandhu pogudhey
Manalvirandhu pogudhey, mayakki mayakki pogudhey
Vaan nilva naan thazhuva thaen nilavaa maarudhey
Nila Nila Nila Nila
Nila Nila Nila Nila .. (Nila Nila Poguthae..)

Maalai velayil pookum poovaye
Manadhil pokkisathai vaikum velaye
Mouna pootinai thirakkum saaviyai
Kanavai urutti vidum kalla soliye

Manjam vandha madhiye , en uyirin meedhiye
viragathai pootum vizhigalin sadhiye
Siragulla silaye, sitrinba nadhiye

Nila nila moga nila,
Manjal nila pogudhey, moga nila pogudhey
kaadu mala medu ellaam maranji maranji pogudhu...

Moondru jaamamum mayangum velayil
Marugi Marugi nila enna pesudho
Kadhal kannile,vetkam nenjile
Irundhum paarvayile jaadai pesudho

Mangai udal nilaava
Mangai udal nilaavai mounathil thaeya
Pongi varum oliyaai ..
Mulumadhiyo kaaya, moochukulal theeya (Nila Nila Poguthae..)

Inba nila pogudhey, idam marandhu pogudhey
Manalvirandhu pogudhey, mayakki mayakki pogudhey
Vaan nilva naan thazhuva thaen nilavaa maarudhey
[Nila Nila Nila Nila
Nila Nila Nila Nila ] (2)

seo.title: Nila Nila Poguthae Lyrics Aravaan Songs Lyics
seo.description: Get the complete Nila Nila Poguthae Lyrics Aravaan Songs Lyics from Aravaan. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by karthik and sung by Harini. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Aravaan, karthik, Harini, Vijay Prakash, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
